release.description: This release of the Profile Setup application is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Profile Setup application is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.

release.description: This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.

This release of Sawmill is a component of the integrated release 1.2.0 of the PDS 2010 System.This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Migrated this project to be a sub-project of the overall Report Service project.

release.description: This release of the Report Service is a component of the integrated releases 1.0.0 and 1.1.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This latest release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Provided the initial documentation covering installation and operation of the software.
